Medium: 16mm and 35mm films transferred to seven-channel video (black and white, silent)
CreditLine: Gift of Kathy and Richard S. Fuld, Jr., Agnes Gund and Daniel Shapiro, Marie-Josée and Henry R. Kravis, and David Rockefeller in memory of Peter Haas
Title: 7 Fragments for Georges Méliès, Installation of seven film fragments: Invisible Mending; Moveable Assets; Autodidact; Feats of Prestidigitation; Tabula Rasa I; Tabula Rasa II; and Balancing Act
